actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide dental care to veterans awarded the Purple Heart, and for other purposes.
short_title: Make Our Veterans Smile Act of 2012

summary.text: Make Our Veterans Smile Act of 2012 - Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs (VA), beginning on January 1, 2013, to provide necessary outpatient dental services and treatment and related dental appliances to veterans awarded the Purple Heart.

titles.title: Make Our Veterans Smile Act of 2012
To amend title 38, United States Code, to direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide dental care to veterans awarded the Purple Heart, and for other purposes.
